input_text:
Job Title: DSP Engineer

Location: Sterling, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description

We are currently seeking a DSP Engineer to join our team in support of projects focus on Electronic Warfare and cUAV technology platforms. This position is focused on writing C/C++ code and algorithm implementation. This team plays a big part in integrating and helping other components of the system come together making it a great opportunity to learn how the system works holistically. This team is both building additional capabilities on currently deployed systems and working on the prototypes for Versions 3 and 4 next gen systems.

Day To Day

 Sprint/Agile development environment Design, develop, debug, and test signal processing algorithms Enhance and maintain existing X-Midas and M2Extra tools for signal analysis Software development in Python, C++, and other OOP languages on a Linux OS

Skills

C++, Signal processing, Linux, Numpy, SIGINT, Communication Systems, Satellite, Satcom

Top Skills Details

C++,Signal processing,Linux

Required Experience

Additional Skills & Qualifications:

 Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Engineering 2+ years of experience with C++ and Python Experience developing software defined radios Experience/knowledge of software channeling, filtering, modulation/demodulation, spectrum analysis, telemetry systems, error correcting, digital video formats, and/or image processing Digital Signal Processing (DSP) with understanding of satellite or communication systems design Ability to obtain and maintain a TS//SCI Clearance

Highly Desired

 Experience with GNU Radio or X-Midas Experience with CUDA and GPU HW acceleration for DSP applications Active TS//SCI Clearance (US Citizenship Required)

***Screening Questions***

 What is your knowledge/experience with: software channeling, filtering, modulation/demodulation, spectrum analysis, telemetry systems, error correcting, digital video formats, and/or image processing What is your knowledge of Modulation/Demodulation Schemes such as: BPSK, OFDM, QPSK, FSK, DSSS, CDMA, FFT? What is your experience with Software Channeling, Filtering, Receivers, Transceivers, and Tuning?

Experience Level

Intermediate Level

About Actalent

Actalent is a global leader in engineering and sciences services and talent solutions. We help visionary companies advance their engineering and science initiatives through access to specialized experts who drive scale, innovation and speed to market. With a network of almost 30,000 consultants and more than 4,500 clients across the U.S., Canada, Asia and Europe, Actalent serves many of the Fortune 500.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

At Actalent, Diversity And Inclusion Are a Bridge Towards The Equity And Success Of Our People. DE&I Are Embedded Into Our Culture Through

Hiring diverse talentMaintaining an inclusive environment through persistent self-reflectionBuilding a culture of care, engagement, and recognition with clear outcomesEnsuring growth opportunities for our people

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regard to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

If you would like to request a reasonable accommodation, such as the modification or adjustment of the job application process or interviewing process due to a disability, please email actalentaccommodation@actalentservices.com for other accommodation options.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
